title: Santa Fe National Historic Trail: New Mexico Exhibits
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Exhibits     New Mexico Exhibits                 New Mexico Exhibits       Travel the trail by reading exhibits in towns across Missouri, Kansas, Colorado, Oklahoma, and New Mexico. The western terminus of the trail found traders in Santa Fe, New Mexico, where they returned with gold, silver, furs, wool, mules, and horses. Amelia White Park Fort Marcy Whittington Center       Excellent Santa Fe wagon ruts can be seen as you drive into Fort Union, New Mexico. Read all about them in the outdoor exhibits. NPS       BACK TO EXHIBITS PAGE
